content.rendered:
Directed by Vipul Amrutlal Shah. Mozez Singh.

Written by Ishani Banerjee. Arjun Bhandegaonkar. Aasif Moyal. Stuti Nair. Darshan Prakaash Aka Abhishek Pandey. Mozez Singh.

Cast Kirti Kulhari( Dr. Saira Sabharwal 1) . Vishal Jethwa( Mangu 1) . Riddhi Kumar( Deepali 1) . Shruti Bapna( Sucheta Shekhawat 1) . Indraneil Sengupta( Neil 1) . Aditya Srivastav( Ashok Vaidya 1) . Atul Kumar( Dr. Snehal Shindey 1) . Ram Kapoor( Pratap Munjal 1) . Pranali Ghoghare( Meena 1) . Seema Biswas( Roma 1) . Mohan Agashe( Mohan Vaidya 1) . Aasif Khan( Asif Khan 1) . Sandeep Kulkarni( Pramod Ahuja 1) . Sushil Pandey( Mangu’s Father 1) . Gaurav Dwivedi( Dr. Vivek Shekhawat 1) . Aayush Agrawal( Aayush Agrawal 1) . Shadab Siddiqui( Dr. Deepak 1) . Simran Pilania( Kusum). Rama Krishna Dixit( Raghav Chandra). Siddhant Karnick( Ravish). Ruchira Ghormare( Young Roma). Vinod Johari( Dr. Abhimanyu Nath). Mark Bennington( Dr. Ross). Ansha Sayed( Shalini). Shiv Kanungo( Babloo). Kushmala Jain( Anita). Nishu Dikshit( SSS Reporter). Hansa Singh( Dr. Gul Goyal). Rahul Tiwari( Balram).Praveen Gadkar . Goyendra Raj( Patient). Debasree Ghosh( Jamuna). Manisha Mondal( Reporter)

Language Hindi.

Producers Nikhil Madhok. Ravichand Nallappa. Aashin A. Shah. Vipul Amrutlal Shah. Richie Taneja. Syed Zaid Ali. Jigar Shah.

Production Sunshine Pictures.

 

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 10

Status OnGoing (2022–)
